dc:title: On Pilgrimage - December 1946
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes a visit to Martin de Porres house of hospitality in Harrisburg, Pennsylvania. Reflects on the seeming futility of the work and how "it is undoubtedly a manifestation of love, of God's love."
